name: Asteroids Chasers (GB)
description:
It is based on the free print&play tile game Cheese Chasers from Bran McMillin.

The Basic mode is based on the original game, while the Easy mode has less tiles, and only need 1 inactivated mine to win.

This is a very prelimary rom, in fact, this is my learning project for Game Boy development.

Many features from the Lynx version are not implemented (yet) :

  • Music
  • Achievements
  • Plus mode
  • Unlockable elements (map, undo...)

Please read the How to Play file before trying to play :D

Credits :

- Original boardgame : Bran McMillin

- Code : Fadest, using GBDK

- Graphs : Fadest
